au.edu.anu.omhtk.jars

Class Jars

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.anu.omhtk.jars.Jars

  • public class Jars
extends java.lang.Object

    Testing if this code is running from a jar - hack found there. The test is based on the existence of the manifest.
